name: EmbeddedPages
description: This mashup reflects the pages you've specified in URL or Template URL custom fields as an embedded page on an entity view.

scripts.build:library: outputPath=build/library; rm -rf $outputPath; NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/library.config.js --output-path $outputPath --progress; npm run build:library:docs
scripts.build:manager: outputPath=build/manager; rm -rf $outputPath; NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/manager.config.js --output-path $outputPath --progress; cd $outputPath; cat mashup.config.js index.js > _tmp.js; rm mashup.config.js index.js; mv _tmp.js index.js;
scripts.build:all: npm run build:library && npm run build:manager

author: Targetprocess <dev@targetprocess.com>
